channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Grammarly rebrands to ‘Superhuman,’ launches a new AI assistant
item.description: Grammarly is renaming itself as Superhuman, after acquiring Superhuman email client in July

item.title: US signs collaboration agreements with Japan and South Korea for AI, chips and biotech
item.description: The U.S. inked Technology Prosperity Deals (TPD) with Japan and South Korea with an eye towards spurring collaboration on AI, semiconductors, quantum ...

item.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025: Day 3
item.description: This is the third and final day of TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 at Moscone West in San Francisco. Register here to get a 50% discount and don't miss out on...

item.title: YouTube looks to improve its TV app with QR codes for shopping, AI-powered upscaling
item.description: Key updates include the introduction of QR codes that let you identify and shop for items in tagged videos, AI-powered upscaling, and improved search.

item.title: Amazon Echo Studio (2nd Gen) and Echo Dot Max Review: Bigger Sound, Bigger Price
item.description: Amazon's new Echo Studio and Dot models get a new look and more power behind the sound and smarts.

item.title: Best MacBooks (2025): Which Apple Laptop Should You Buy?
item.description: With the new M5 MacBook Pro, it's more complicated than ever to figure out the right MacBook for you.

item.title: Etsy names former head of Depop, Kruti Patel Goyal, as its new CEO
item.description: Kruti Patel Goyal is replacing Etsy's long-time CEO, Josh Silverman, who is stepping down by the end of the year.

item.title: Donald Trump Is the First AI Slop President
item.description: How do AI videos end up on Donald Trump’s social media accounts? WIRED investigates.

item.title: 9 Best Tents (2025), Tested: Camping, Family, and Outdoor Palaces
item.description: The right shelter can make a big difference in how comfortable you are outdoors. Here are the ones we’ve tested and love.

item.title: Best Open Earbuds, Tested and Reviewed (2025): Bose, Soundcore, and More
item.description: These wireless earbuds with an “open” design let you zone out to your music while also keeping aware of your surroundings.
